successes.title: HDHomeRun DVR. The DVR re-imagined.
successes.description: The ultimate DVR experience. A simple & cost effective way to record and watch TV on media devices around your home. TV on your terms.

Pledges.description: Show your support and help us reach our goals! We will add you to our supporters list and keep you up to date with progress.
Already have a HDHomeRun PRIME, CONNECT, or EXTEND (HDHR3-CC, HDHR4, or HDTC)?
Show your support with a 1 year subscription ($30) and get the HDHomeRun DVR software one month before the public signup.
Already have a HDHomeRun PRIME, CONNECT, or EXTEND (HDHR3-CC, HDHR4, or HDTC)?
Show your support, get regular progress builds of the HDHomeRun DVR software, give us feedback before it goes to Release Candidate, and get a 1 year subscription to the DVR service ($30 value)

Get your choice of a HDHomeRun PRIME (3 tuner CableCARD) or HDHomeRun CONNECT (2 tuner ATSC), plus get regular progress builds of the HDHomeRun DVR software, give us feedback before it goes to Release Candidate, and get a 1 year subscription to the DVR service ($30 value). HDHomeRun unit ships right away. Free shipping.

Get a HDHomeRun HDHR4-2DT (2 tuner DVB-T/T2), get regular progress builds of the HDHomeRun DVR software, give us feedback before it goes to Release Candidate, and get a 1 year subscription to the DVR service ($30 value). HDHomeRun unit ships June. Free shipping.

Get a HDHomeRun EXTEND (2 tuner ATSC with hardware transcode), plus get regular progress builds of the HDHomeRun DVR software, give us feedback before it goes to Release Candidate, and get a 1 year subscription to the DVR service ($30 value). HDHomeRun unit ships right away. Free shipping.
Already have a HDHomeRun PRIME, CONNECT, or EXTEND (HDHR3-CC, HDHR4, or HDTC)?
